title: Where is the 'Unofficial FontLab 4.5 Python reference' website gone?
content:
This very useful website at [http://dev.fontlab.net/flpydoc/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824062850/http:/dev.fontlab.net/flpydoc/ "http://dev.fontlab.net/flpydoc/") seems to have gone off-line. Does anyone know what has happened and if it is likely to come back?

Malcolm
author: malcolm

comments.content:
Erik van Blokland asked about this on the RoboFab list, too, and provided a link to an archived version:

[http://web.archive.org/web/20080618185648/http://www.dev.fontlab.net/flp...](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824062850/http:/web.archive.org/web/20080618185648/http:/www.dev.fontlab.net/flpydoc/ "http://web.archive.org/web/20080618185648/http://www.dev.fontlab.net/flpydoc/")
I think that something is up with DNS for Fontlab.com, as steroid.fontlab.net is also gone.

Hello,

Until Adams server is up again you can use:

[http://www.e-font.de/flpydoc/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130824062850/http:/www.e-font.de/flpydoc/ "http://www.e-font.de/flpydoc/")

Regards  
Eigi
